author: hlship
msg: Create new implementations of IMarkupWriter, and remove AbstractMarkupWriter, etc.
Extend WebResponse with methods for obtaining an OutputStream or PrintWriter.

author: pferraro
msg: Fixed incorrect log message when getLink() is called with the wrong number of parameters.  This would only be the case if a user is using the AssetService with a custom IAsset implementation.

author: pferraro
msg: Added fix for TAPESTRY-284 to 3.0.3 release.

author: pferraro
msg: TAPESTRY-284: Engine does not properly cleanup after a client aborts a request.
